name: Grey Goose Le Citron Asian Mary

ingredients.item: Grey Goose Le Citron Flavored Vodka

preparation:
Spice up this classic with a wasabi-spiked tomato mix.

Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice.

Shake vigorously and strain into a large tumbler filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with shiso or cilantro leaves and a lemon wheel.
